title: Island Gal - She's - Image 1 from Rihanna's Denim Obsession

meta_data.description: Island Gal - She's a certified stunner on the red carpet, but if there's one material Rihanna loves, it's denim. She knows how to keep the everyday look casual, as well as spice it up with a few chic accessories. Take a look.Has denim on denim ever looked so hot? Rihanna posed for a couple of sexy Instagram pics in her River Island denim crop top and jeans. Her look was accessorized with a backwards baseball cap, sunglasses, and gold bracelets(Photos: Rihanna via Instagram) - The star shows us various ways to rock the classic material.
